/*
prt_in,31,109,3	script	NotAngeling	10538,{
	// When player clicks the NPC
	//npctalk "This shop is currently: " + getvariableofnpc(.CurrentShop$,"NotAngeling") + ".";
	mes "[NotAngeling]";
	mes "We do NOT sell NYAN! Only special packs of it.";
	close2;
	callshop getvariableofnpc(.CurrentShop$,"NotAngeling"), 1;
	end;

OnInit:
	// List of barter shops
	setarray .ShopList$[0],
		"bartershopshop1",
		"bartershopshop2",
		"bartershopshop3",
		"bartershopshop4";

	// Pick one immediately when server starts
	callsub L_Randomize;

	// Start 2-hour timer
//	addtimer 60000, "NotAngeling::OnTwoHours";
	end;

OnMinute00:
	callsub L_Randomize;
	end;
	

L_Randomize:
	.@i = rand(getarraysize(.ShopList$));
	.CurrentShop$ = .ShopList$[.@i];
	//npctalk "Shop has rotated to: " + .CurrentShop$ + "!";
	announce "NotAngeling Shop is now refreshed!", bc_all, "0x00FFAA";
	return;
}
*/
